'''Special Programs''' (SP) are broadcasts that announce the content of an upcoming [[version]] of ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. They can take the form of:
* Twitch live streams (English), which are prerecorded then broadcast to [https://twitch.tv/genshinimpactofficial ''Genshin Impact''{{'}}s Twitch channel].
* YouTube premieres (English, Japanese, Korean), which are published to [https://www.youtube.com/c/genshinimpact ''Genshin Impact''{{'}}s official YouTube channel] on a specific date.
* Bilibili live streams (Chinese), which are broadcast to [https://space.bilibili.com/401742377/ ''Genshin Impact''{{'}}s official Bilibili channel].

==Trivia==
* The [[Version 1.1]] Special Program premiered on the ''Genshin Impact'' YouTube Channel, but the premiere was removed after.
* The Chinese Special Program is often hosted by one of the Chinese voice directors of ''Genshin Impact'', Peng Bo (who also voices [[Zhongli]]), Lin Su (who also voices [[Jean]] and [[Ganyu]]), and Mace (who also voices [[Fischl]] and [[Albedo]]).
** Mace was promoted to be one of the voice directors around [[Version 2.8]], and her promotion was first confirmed officially through [https://youtu.be/RUe2BDz6RO4 Honkai Impact 3rd Animated Short: Because of You].
* The English Special Program is mostly hosted by Zach Aguilar (who voices [[Aether]]).
* The Japanese Special Program, especially with voice actors, becomes a norm only after [[Version 3.2]]. Before, except for main Version updates (2.0 and 3.0), and TGS Event Special Programs, there were only recaps of Chinese Special Programs available on ''Genshin Impact''{{'}}s Official Japanese Twitter account.
